summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3604 , for the improvement of 5th Avenue West (east side) from West Ray Street to West Barrett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 44474, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
